description.value: Table of codes that specify the security classification; the codes are non-overlapping n the following hierarchical order: Very Restricted > Restricted > Normal > Moderate > Low > Unrestricted More information may be found the HL7 Healthcare Privacy and Security Classification System (HCS), Release 1 (see: http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=345) For the list of codes in the table, see the HL7 Webpage rendering.
